description: Eliza Jane's failing grades are jeopardizing her evil step mother's (Darling) extravagant lifestyle, and she entrusts Xander Corvus to do something about it. Xander punishes Mommy and her slutty Step Daughter with bondage, clamps, gags and hardcore anal sex, and teaches them both that there is no room for irresponsible sluts on The Upper Floor.
title: Improving Mommy's Spoiled Step Daughter's Failing Grades
